definition: covered with fine whitish hairs or down
details:
adjective
- covered with fine whitish hairs or down
= synonyms: canescent
- ancient
= example: ancient
= synonyms: rusty
- showing characteristics of age, especially having grey or white hair
= synonyms: grey, gray, grey-haired, gray-haired, grey-headed, gray-headed, grizzly, hoar, white-haired
